title: Handle a Walk-in Guest at a Busy Restaurant
description: A party of four arrives at the hotel restaurant without a reservation on a busy night.

tasks.description: Check the reservation system for the current wait time and any potential no-shows.
tasks.expected_outcome: The host sees a 30-minute wait but also a large reservation that is 15 minutes late.

tasks.description: Inform the walk-in party of the estimated wait time and offer to add them to the waitlist.
tasks.expected_outcome: The host clearly communicates the wait time.

tasks.description: Add the party to the digital waitlist, which will send them a text message when their table is ready.
tasks.expected_outcome: The party is successfully added to the waitlist.
